New Records: David Warner broke the record for the most consecutive ODI centuries against Pakistan with four
Key Match Events: David Warner and Mitch Marsh shared a 259-run opening stand
Warner hit six sixes during his innings
Marsh brought up his own century with a powerful back foot drive
Pre-Game Insights: There are no pre-game insights mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: David Warner reflected on his success against Pakistan, stating that he doesn't look at which teams he has success against or not
Warner also praised birthday boy centurion Mitch Marsh
Miscellaneous Highlights: David Warner passed Adam Gilchrist to become Australia's second-highest run-scorer at 50-over World Cups
Warner is now level with AB de Villiers as the men's game's 10th most prolific century-maker across all formats
Warner's strike rate of 115.29 in 2023 is the highest of any year across his 13-year career
